text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly addresses the Regulatory Reform (Fire Safety) Order 2005 (FSO) and correctly identifies the concept of the 'Responsible Person' (RP). Specifically, under section 1) A, it mentions Article 5(3) which covers shared/overlapping control, and Article 22 regarding coordination, which directly relates to the structure of dutyholders under the FSO.
